text: Lawrence Patrick Jackson is an American writer. He is the Bloomberg Distinguished Professor of History and English at Johns Hopkins University. He won a Hurston-Wright Legacy Award and a 2019 Guggenheim Fellowship. He graduated from Stanford University. His work was in the Los Angeles Review of Books.
